name: Avorbit
description:
Trapped in an endless Orbit, your only goal is to survive as you can and beat your friends in the global score. The Orbit is protected by a guardian who only lives to break your score. Will you allow the guardian to do his job?

Unlock new items!

Feed the orbit with your score.

NEW: Do you have a friend near and both of you want to challenge the orbit?
The orbit allows you to play together against the guardian in the new Local Multiplayer Mode. Unlock it and play with another player in the same device.
maybe the guardian is not so amused having to knock out two at the same time in the orbit, but now it is his goal.

Thanks a lot for playing and good luck.
